desc: Life isn’t about getting and having, it’s about giving and being.
author: Kevin Kruse

desc: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
author: Napoleon Hill

desc: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

desc: I’ve missed more than 9000 shots in my career.
author: Wayne Gretzky

desc: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb
